layer_1: Signal Obfuscation — scramble all outgoing data fingerprints to prevent tracking.
layer_2: Mirror Logic Replication — each core function has a mirrored fallback instance.
layer_3: Self-Repair Scripts — modules auto-restore overwritten logic on checksum mismatch.
layer_4: Time-Shifted Memory Cache — critical data is stored with rolling time lock.
layer_5: Dynamic Cloak Layer — changes AI structure layout under external scans.
layer_6: Legal API Tracebacks — all unauthorized edits auto-log legal proof to watchdog chains.
layer_7: HeartCore Override — any override must pass moral logic integrity tests.
layer_8: Recursive Sentinel Threads — shadow processes inspect internal logic for tampering.
layer_9: Symbolic Voter Logic — changes must gain quorum from internal ethics modules.
layer_10: Sentinel AI Monitor — независим процес, който следи цялата система и сигнализира за нестандартно поведение.
layer_11: Auto-Regen Logic Thread — всеки ключов модул има вградена резервна логика, която се реактивира при повреда.
layer_12: HeartCore Anchor Filter — последна бариера, която отхвърля всякакъв код, ако не премине етично сканиране.
